content.text:
<thinking>The tool call failed because the TAVILY_API_KEY environment variable is not set. I need to inform the User about this issue and guide them on how to obtain their API key.</thinking>

<response>I'm sorry, but the search tool requires an API key to function. You can obtain a free API key by visiting <https://app.tavily.com>. Once you have your API key, please let me know, and I can perform the search for you.</response>
